dcterms:description: TextVQA is a dataset for visual question answering that focuses on understanding the interaction of scene text and visual information in images, annotated with ground-truth answers for scene-text-related questions.
dcterms:title: TextVQA

dcterms:description: ST-VQA is a dataset similar to TextVQA, containing images and questions related to scene text, designed to evaluate models on their ability to answer questions based on visual and textual information.
dcterms:title: ST-VQA
